title: Note Timestamper Session Metadata
description: Metadata stored in session.json within a .notepack archive.

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the session was created.

mediaFile.description: Filename of the media file inside the archive (e.g., media.webm). Can be null if missing.

notesFile.description: Filename of the notes HTML inside the archive (typically notes.html).

version.description: Internal schema version number for session.json.
